title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp oil and 2 tbsp butter in a pan on medium heat.
Add 1/2 tsp cumin seeds and let them splutter.
Add finely chopped onions and sauté until they turn golden brown.
Add 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1–2 minutes until the raw smell disappears.
Add the tomato puree and cook for 5–7 minutes until the mixture thickens and oil starts to separate.
Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Add paneer cubes and gently mix them into the gravy. Cook for 3–4 minutes.
Add 2 tbsp fresh cream and stir well. Simmer for another 2 minutes.
Turn off the heat. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.
Serve hot with naan, roti, or steamed rice.
